related_questions.question: What is the process of solar energy?
related_questions.snippet: Solar panels work by absorbing sunlight with photovoltaic cells, generating direct current (DC) energy and then converting it to usable alternating current (AC) energy with the help of inverter technology. AC energy then flows through the home's electrical panel and is distributed accordingly.Aug 5, 2019
related_questions.title: How Do Solar Panels Work? Step by Step Overview | EnergySage

related_questions.question: What is solar energy in simple words?
related_questions.snippet: Solar cells can be used to generate electricity from sunlight. It is a device that converts light energy into electrical energy. Sometimes the term solar cell is reserved for devices intended specifically to capture energy from sunlight, while the term photovoltaic cell is used when the light source is unspecified.
related_questions.title: Solar energy - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

related_questions.question: Where does the solar energy come from?
related_questions.snippet: The sun has produced energy for billions of years. Solar energy is the solar radiation that reaches the earth. Solar energy can be converted directly or indirectly into other forms of energy, such as heat and electricity.
